title: Lukewarm bean salad
directions: Let the peppers in a colander and place in a bowl. Rinse the bean mixture under cold running water and drain. Cut the peppers into pieces and slice the garlic. Heat 2 tbsp oil in a frying pan and fry the garlic for 30 seconds. Add the peppers, beans, pepper and salt and cook for 6 minutes. On low heat. Spoon occasionally gently.
Meanwhile, cut the tomatoes into wedges. Whisk the remaining oil with the balsamic vinegar into a dressing. Tear the basil leaves into pieces.
Divide the bean mixture over a large shallow dish. Divide the tomato, mozzarella and arugula and drizzle with the dressing. Spoon gently and garnish with basil.
ingredients: 740 g kidney bean mixture, brown and white beans (pot Ã  370 g, Hak)
